core.name: Solar Nectar
core.note: Primary brand warmth; strong CTA fills, key highlights, active states.

core.name: Sunburst Orange
core.note: Secondary warm tone; secondary buttons, badges, emphasis chips.

core.name: Ember Coral
core.note: Attention hue; error-adjacent accents, critical highlights, illustrations.

core.name: Hot Rose
core.note: Energetic core pink; primary gradient stops, links on light backgrounds, selected states.

core.name: Magenta Glow
core.note: Depth tone; headers, hero gradients, focus rings (pair with softer outer glows).

accents.name: Tangerine Highlight
accents.note: Accent pop; hover states, small UI highlights, subtle icon fills.

accents.name: Apricot Haze
accents.note: Soft supporting warmth; card accents, secondary surfaces, gentle dividers.

accents.name: Melon Pink
accents.note: Accent pink; tags, progress/health indicators, playful micro-interactions.

accents.name: Orchid Transition
accents.note: Bridge tone between pink/magenta; gradients, shadows/glows, subtle emphasis backgrounds.

backgroundWash.name: Pistachio Mist
backgroundWash.note: Background wash; large app/page backgrounds preserving the pale green-yellow mood.

backgroundWash.name: Warm Cream
backgroundWash.note: Background wash; panels and content areas where you want maximum readability.

backgroundWash.name: Peach Fog
backgroundWash.note: Background wash; warm-tinted sections, empty states, subtle hero backdrops.

recommendedTextColors.name: Deep Olive Charcoal
recommendedTextColors.note: Dark text on background washes; body copy, headings, UI labels.

recommendedTextColors.name: Soft Warm White
recommendedTextColors.note: Light text on Hot Rose/Magenta Glow; button text, inverse headers, overlays.
